00036 // and 59 bytes in case of IEEE address
00037 #define DSTUB_PAYLOAD_MAXSIZE 64
00038

00040 #define ZGP_MAINTENACE_FRAME_CMD_LENGTH  2 // 1(commmand id) + payload
00041 #define ZGP_FRAME_MIN_SECURITY_HEADER 8 // 4 -FC 4 - MIC
